content.prompt: The Stonewall riots of 1969 were significant because they

choices.label: marked the end of the African American Civil Rights movement
drew attention to the increasing gap between the incomes of people who were wealthy and people living in poverty
highlighted the efforts of César Chávez to organize Mexican American farmworkers
led to the birth of gay rights organizations around the country
undermined the efforts of the National Organization for Women

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
